q: Chrysler's market share rose to 9.2 per cent from 8.8 per cent. "We have slowly recovered from the low volumes of 2009, up 15 per cent," Sergio Marchionne said, pointing to the significant performance in Canada. Our market share in Canada has been exceptionally good. Chrysler's global sales last year topped 1.5 million cars and trucks, buoyed by a raft of new models.
